intro: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm currently a third year student at Champlain College, deep in the world of Computer Science. This portfolio is my personal playground and workshopâ€”here's where you'll see the projects I've thrown my code and creativity into, the skills I've picked up along the way, and my experiences. Take a look around to get a glimpse of my coding adventures and the breakthroughs that keep me motivated. If anything here catches your eye, I'd love to chat about it!
intership: During this internship, I served as a backend developer for their new user application. I immersed myself in understanding a multifaceted system, effectively managing a variety of tasks including testing, internationalization, bug fixes, maintenance operations, and more, across different components of the system.
role: Backend Developper Intership at Opal RT Technologies
